name: day-38-task---hall-booking
description: Created a Hall Booking API with Node and Express. 1. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/get-all-room - To GET All Room Details. 2. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/create-room - To POST the Room Details in the API. 3. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/booking-room - To POST the booked Room Details in the API. 4. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/booked-data - To GET all rooms with Booked Details. 5. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/customer-data - To GET all Customer with Booked Details 6. https://hall-booking-mcgh.onrender.com/hall-booking/bookedCount/:customer_name - To GET Customer Details with number of times the room booked.
